sentences.english: Those plants that determined as haploids were doubled by 2%colchicine.
sentences.chinese: 经鉴定为单倍体的植株，用2%秋水仙素进行加倍。

sentences.english: It arises by fusion of haploid gametes produced by the haploid generation (GAMETOPHYTE).
sentences.chinese: 无性生殖可产生单倍体的孢子。

sentences.english: Generative cell One of the haploid cells in the POLLEN TUBE of seed plants.
sentences.chinese: 是位于种子植物花粉管中的一个单倍体细胞。

sentences.english: Application and source of plant haploids were concisely introduced.
sentences.chinese: 对单倍体的用途和来源作了简略的概括。

sentences.english: Microspore culture is an effcient method to produce haploid plant, which ho been vigorously studied.
sentences.chinese: 游离小孢子培养是产生单倍体的较好途径。

sentences.english: In contrast, haploidy seems less compatible with development in mammals.
sentences.chinese: 相反的，哺乳动物的单倍体似乎与发育的兼容性较差。

sentences.english: Monoploid peaches havebeenobtained from seedling populations.
sentences.chinese: 从实生群体里曾经得到过单倍体桃。

sentences.english: The report which follows studies on the embryonic development of Misgurnus anguillicaudatus.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了泥鳅雌核单倍体的胚胎发育。

sentences.english: G—banding by ASG technique presented 24 bands in haploid set of full metaphase.
sentences.chinese: 带染色单倍体组中期分裂相约有24条深带。

sentences.english: Each mating has generated all possible types of haploid progeny.
sentences.chinese: 每种配对都产生出所有可能单倍体子代。

sentences.english: The number of round haploid spermatids was increased.
sentences.chinese: 单倍体圆形精子细胞增多。

sentences.english: Meiosis comprises a pair of specialized nuclear divisions that produce haploid germ cells.
sentences.chinese: 减数分裂由两次产生单倍体生殖细胞的核分裂组成。

sentences.english: Spore mother cell A cell that gives rise to four haploid spores by meiosis.
sentences.chinese: 可以发生减数分裂产生四个单倍体孢子的细胞。

definition: allele (one of two paired gene in diploid organism)
